bilingual.source: Recently, I haven't been feeling very well.
I've recently started at a new school.
bilingual.target: 我最近在一所新学校开始上学。

bilingual.source: Hi, Jamal. What have you been up to recently?
bilingual.target: 嗨，贾马尔。你最近在忙什么？

bilingual.source: Have you been on any interesting trips recently?
bilingual.target: 你最近有去过有趣的旅行吗？

bilingual.source: People have recently brought these issues into focus.
bilingual.target: 人们最近开始关注这些问题。

bilingual.source: I know she's been busy recently, and I understand that.
bilingual.target: 我知道她最近很忙，我理解。
最近，托德·赖克特建造了一架扑翼机。

bilingual.source: He has become very interested in chess recently.
bilingual.target: 最近他对国际象棋产生了很大的兴趣。

bilingual.source: However, until recently no one knew how they did this.
bilingual.target: 然而，直到最近没有人知道它们是如何做到的。

bilingual.source: Amy recently won a prize from the Help Save Our Planet Society.
bilingual.target: 艾米最近赢得了拯救地球协会的奖项。

list.abstract: recently（英 [ˈriːsntli]，美 [ˈriːsntli]），英语单词，作副词为最近、新近、近来。短语搭配为until recently（直到最近）。例句有Recently, I took a trip home by train.（现在许多人乘高铁在中国旅行。） recently的副词近义词有newly、new、last等。

yingyinNormal.en: Recently, some new players entered the fray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近一些新成员加入了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, well, I got married recently. Oh, congratulations! To Sheldon?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我最近结婚了。恭喜你，和谢尔顿吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps you heard, Hanna Schmitz recently died. She killed herself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许你已经听说了，汉娜·施密茨最近死了。她是自杀的。

yingyinNormal.en: And now, more recently a Russian warhead. Disarmed Russian warhead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而最近，居然搞起了一枚俄罗斯弹头。是解除了危险的俄罗斯弹头。

yingyinNormal.en: But you weren't aware of that fact until very recently. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你不是最近才发现你身世的秘密吗？不。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my God. Have you ever been so embarrassed? Not recently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天呐，你有没试过如此丢人？至少最近没有。

yingyinNormal.en: I have noticed that Leslie winkle recently started shaving her legs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我注意到莱斯利·温克最近在刮她的腿毛。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Your Honor, my firm recently fired ten lawyers who were poaching clients.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，法官阁下，我们律所最近解雇了十名偷挖客户的律师。

yingyinNormal.en: With all due respect, Guardian, your powers have proved unreliable at best recently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恕我直言，守护者，你的力量已经证明不可靠，尤其是最近。

yingyinNormal.en: I've started a new career recently. This is a fifth generation company which means a lot to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最近开始了一份新的事业，这个第五代公司对我来说意义重大。

yingyinNormal.en: I saw something on the Bill Moyers show, recently, that so reminded me of this point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近，我在比尔莫耶斯访谈节目中看到的一些事情，使我更加明确了这一点。

yingyinNormal.en: This wheat was harvested recently and has to be dried before it can be bagged up ready for the short journey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些小麦是最近收割的，然后在短途运输中，必须风干了。

yingyinNormal.en: Recently divorced doctor with a ginger cat a barn conversion and a history of erectile dysfunction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近刚离婚的医生，有一只姜黄色的猫，有一处改建房，曾经阳痿。

yingyinNormal.en: Not the present situation, I'm afraid. Mr Stern recently absconded from prison. He's currently on the run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但恐怕不是目前的状况了，斯特恩先生最近越狱了，他正在逃亡中。

yingyinNormal.en: Turns out recently, Andrew married Simon. My bitter rival from law school. Or nemesis? I've...
yingyinNormal.zh: 没想到，安德鲁最近跟西蒙结婚了。我在法学院的死敌，或者说…冤家？我已经…

yingyinNormal.en: Most recently last year during lunch on the afternoon of May seventh. You had turkey and complained it was dry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近一次是去年5月7日中午午餐期间，你吃了火鸡，还抱怨太干了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why wouldn't I? You know, recently, it seems like the whole world is calling to me in a way it hasn't before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么不会？最近整个世界都好像在与我对话。以一种前所未有的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: They call it "Groot." A humanoid plant that's been travelling recently as 89P13's personal houseplant/muscle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们叫它格鲁特，这个树人最近跟在89P13身边，当他的室内植物兼保镖。

yingyinNormal.en: Recently, Thanos lent her and her sister Nebula out to Ronan, which leads us to believe that Thanos and Ronan are working together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近她和妹妹涅布拉为罗南效力，因此我们认为萨诺斯与罗南合作。

yingyinNormal.en: And recently he's convinced that his long deceased family is still alive. And, of course, his family cannot really be alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近他坚信去世很久的家里人还活着，当然，他的家人其实不可能活着。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I've traveled back several times since, most <highlight>recently</highlight> this past spring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 之后我又去了几次，最近一次是今年春天。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Recently</highlight>, I conceptualized a new approach to timekeeping that's connected to circumstances on our planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，我概念化了一种新的计时方法，它与我们星球上的环境有关。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Recently</highlight>, I took a trip home by train.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
recently多位于句末；有时置于句首，表强调；也可放在句中（通常位于释义动词之前，助动词/情态动词/be动词之后）。
示例：The bank recently opened a branch in Germany.
这家银行最近在中国开设了分行。
